member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession.TryConnectAndLogin(System.String,System.String,Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags,System.Version,System.String[],System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Attempt to log in to the Archipelago server by opening a websocket connection and sending a Connect packet. Determining success for this attempt is done by attaching a listener to Socket.PacketReceived and listening for a Connected packet.
member.param: The game this client is playing.
The slot name of this client.
The minimum AP protocol version this client supports.
Informs the AP server how you want ReceivedItem packets to be sent to you.
The tags this client supports.
The uuid of this client.
The password to connect to this AP room.
Decides if the result will contain any slot data
member.returns: if the connection is succeeded and the server accepted the login attempt. if the connection to the server failed in some way.
member.remarks: The connect attempt is synchronous and will lock for up to 5 seconds as it attempts to connect to the server. Most connections are instantaneous however the timeout is 5 seconds before it returns .

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSessionFactory.CreateSession(System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates an object which facilitates all communication to the Archipelago server.
member.param: The full URI to the Archipelago server, including scheme, hostname, and port.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSessionFactory.CreateSession(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an object which facilitates all communication to the Archipelago server.
member.param: The hostname of the Archipelago server, can include protocol and port. Ex: `archipelago.gg`, `localhost`, `localhost:38281` or `ws://archipelago.gg:46376`
(Optional) The port number which the Archipelago server is hosted on. Defaults to: 38281, will be ignored if the port is added to the hostname

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.BounceFeatures.DeathLink.DeathLinkProvider.CreateDeathLinkService(Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession)
member.summary: creates and returns a for this .

member.summary: Formats and sends a Bounce packet using the provided object.
member.param: object containing the information of the death which occurred. Must at least contain the .
member.exception: The websocket connection is not alive

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ConnectionRefusedError.InvalidSlot
member.summary: Indicates that the sent 'name' field did not match any auth entry on the server.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ConnectionRefusedError.InvalidGame
member.summary: Indicates that a correctly named slot was found, but the game for it mismatched.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ConnectionRefusedError.SlotAlreadyTaken
member.summary: Indicates a connection with a different uuid is already established.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ConnectionRefusedError.IncompatibleVersion
member.summary: IncompatibleVersion indicates a version mismatch.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ConnectionRefusedError.InvalidPassword
member.summary: InvalidPassword indicates the wrong, or no password when it was required, was sent.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ConnectionRefusedError.InvalidItemsHandling
member.summary: InvalidItemsHandling indicates a wrong value type or flag combination was sent.

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope
member.summary: Scope for DataStorage keys

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope.Global
member.summary: Keys in this scope are shared with all clients

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope.Game
member.summary: Keys in this scope are with shared with clients that connect under the same game as you connected with

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope.Team
member.summary: Keys in this scope are with shared with clients on your team

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope.Slot
member.summary: Keys in this scope are with shared with clients connected to your slot

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope.ReadOnly
member.summary: Keys in this scope are read-only and can only be updated by the server

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags
member.summary: Indicates to the server how the client would like to get ReceivedItems packets.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags.NoItems
member.summary: Don't get any ReceivedItems packets from the server.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags.RemoteItems
member.summary: Get ReceivedItems packets for items being granted to you by others.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags.IncludeOwnItems
member.summary: Get ReceivedItems packets for items which you picked up in your own world. Automatically includes RemoteItems option as it is required to set this.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags.IncludeStartingInventory
member.summary: Get ReceivedItems packets for your starting inventory. Automatically includes RemoteItems option as it is required to set this.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags.AllItems
member.summary: Get ReceivedItems packets for all remote items, items in your world, and starting inventory granted to you.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.Text
member.summary: Regular text content. this is the default type and as such may be omitted.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.PlayerId
member.summary: Player ID of someone on your team, should be resolved to Player Name

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.PlayerName
member.summary: Player Name, could be a player within a multiplayer game or from another team, not ID resolvable

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.ItemId
member.summary: Item ID, should be resolved to Item Name

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.ItemName
member.summary: Item Name, not currently used over network, but supported by reference Clients.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.LocationId
member.summary: Location ID, should be resolved to Location Name

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.LocationName
member.summary: Location Name, not currently used over network, but supported by reference Clients.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.EntranceName
member.summary: Entrance Name. No ID mapping exists.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.Color
member.summary: Regular text that should be colored. Only type that will contain color data.

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.ArchipelagoSocketHelper.Connected
member.summary: Returns true if the socket believes it is connected to the host. Does not emit a ping to determine if the connection is stable.

member.summary: Initiates a connection to the host.

member.summary: Disconnect from the host.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.ArchipelagoSocketHelper.DisconnectAsync

member.summary: Stored or retrieves a value from the server side data storage. Assignment operations like = or *= will run asynchronously on server only The retrievals are done synchronously however this storage is implemented using deferred execution.
member.param: The scope of the key
The key for which the value should be stored or retrieved
member.returns: A value

member.returns: A value

member.summary: Submit the provided location ids as checked locations.

Location ids which have been checked.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.LocationCheckHelper.ScoutLocationsAsync(System.Action{Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Packets.LocationInfoPacket},System.Boolean,System.Int64[])
member.summary: Ask the server for the items which are present in the provided location ids.
member.param: An action to run once the server responds to the scout packet. If the argument to the action is null then the server responded with an InvalidPacket response.
If true, creates a free hint for these locations.
The locations ids which are to be scouted.
member.remarks: Repeated calls of this method before a LocationInfo packet is received will cause the stored callback to be overwritten with the most recent call. It is recommended you chain calls to this method within the callbacks themselves or call this only once.
member.exception: The websocket connection is not alive.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.LocationCheckHelper.ScoutLocationsAsync(System.Action{Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Packets.LocationInfoPacket},System.Int64[])
member.summary: Ask the server for the items which are present in the provided location ids.
member.param: An action to run once the server responds to the scout packet. If the argument to the action is null then the server responded with an InvalidPacket response.
The locations ids which are to be scouted.
member.remarks: Repeated calls of this method before a LocationInfo packet is received will cause the stored callback to be overwritten with the most recent call. It is recommended you chain calls to this method within the callbacks themselves or call this only once.
member.exception: The websocket connection is not alive.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.LocationCheckHelper.GetLocationIdFromName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the Id of a location from its name. Useful when a game knows its locations by name but not by Archipelago Id.
member.param: The game to look up the locations from
The name of the location to check the Id for. Must match the contents of the datapackage.
member.returns: Returns the locationId for the location name that was given or -1 if no location was found.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.LocationCheckHelper.GetLocationNameFromId(System.Int64)
member.summary: Get the name of a location from its id. Useful when receiving a packet and it is necessary to find the name of the location.
member.param: The Id of the location to look up the name for. Must match the contents of the datapackage.
member.returns: Returns the locationName for the provided locationId, or null if no such location is found.

member.summary: Retrieves the value from the server and casts it to the given type Cannot be used in combination with other operators
member.returns: The value from server as the given type
member.exception: DataStorageElement.To() cannot be used together with other operations on the DataStorageElement Other operations include =, +=, /=, + etc
The websocket connection is not alive

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Models.DataStorageElement.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Models.Callback.Add(Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.DataStorageHelper.DataStorageUpdatedHandler)
member.summary: Adds a callback to the current sequence of operations. This callback will be called only once after the server is done processing your operations. This is useful in-case you need to know the results of your operations when they depend on the current state of the server
member.param: The method to be called with the oldValue at the start of your operation and the newValue after your operation completed

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Packets.RoomUpdatePacket
member.summary: Sent when there is a need to update information about the present game session, All arguments for this packet are nullable, only the properties that are not null contain changes.
